LanguageData.MessageColonistInFinalStagesOfLabor: {PAWN_labelShort}'s labor has begun the final stages.
LanguageData.MessageMechChargerDestroyedMechGoesBerse: {PAWN_nameDef}(이)가 충전하는동안 충전기가 파괴되었습니다! 비정상적인 전력의 흐름이 뇌를 헤집어 광란상태에 빠졌습니다.
LanguageData.MessageCanOnlyTargetColonistsPrisonersAn: 변형이식체는 정착민, 수감자, 혹은 노예에게만 삽입할 수 있습니다.
LanguageData.MessageXenogermCancelledMissingPack: {0_labelShort}에서 변형이식체 작업이 취소됨: 필요한 유전자묶음이 없습니다.
LanguageData.MessageCannotUseOnOtherFactions: {ABILITY_label}(은)는 정착민, 수감자, 혹은 노예에게만 사용할 수 있습니다.
LanguageData.MessageCaravanAddingEscortingMech: Auto-adding {MECH_nameDef} to the caravan, since it is escorting {OVERSEER_nameDef}
LanguageData.MessageCaravanRemovingEscortingMech: Auto-removing {MECH_nameDef} from the caravan, since it is escorting {OVERSEER_nameDef}
LanguageData.MessageMechanitorCasketOpened: {0}(은)는 기계공학자였습니다. {0_possessive} {1_label}(을)를 제거하여 식민지에게 사용할 수 있습니다.
LanguageData.MessageNoBloodfeedersPrisonerInteraction: Some prisoners' interaction mode required a bloodfeeder. Since the last bloodfeeder is gone, their interaction modes have reset to "No interaction".
LanguageData.MessageTargetMustBeDownedToForceReimplan: {PAWN_nameDef} must be downed before you can force {PAWN_objective} to reimplant {PAWN_possessive} xenogerm.
LanguageData.MessageWorkTypeDisabledAge: {0_nameDef} is only {1} years old. {2} work can only be done from age {3}.
LanguageData.MessageDeathrestingPawnCanWakeSafely: {PAWN_nameDef} can now wake from deathrest safely.
LanguageData.MessageMechanitorLostControlOfMech: {0_nameDef} has lost control of a {1_kindBase} mech
LanguageData.MetabolismTooLowToCreateXenogerm: The total metabolism of the selected genes must be {MIN} or higher to continue, but currently it is only {AMOUNT}.
LanguageData.ComplexityTooHighToCreateXenogerm: The total complexity of the selected genes must be {MAX} or less to create a xenogerm, but currently it is {AMOUNT}.
LanguageData.MessageNoSelectedGenepacks: 유전자 없는 변형이식체를 만들 수 없습니다.
LanguageData.MessageNoSelectedGenes: 유전자 없는 인종형을 만들 수 없습니다.
LanguageData.MessageDeathrestCapacityChanged: {PAWN_nameDef}'s deathrest capacity has increased from {OLD} to {NEW}.
LanguageData.SanguophagesArrivingSoon: The sanguophages will arrive in a few hours for their meeting.
LanguageData.SanguophagesBegunMeeting: The sanguophages have begun their meeting.
LanguageData.MessageBedExposedToSunlight: {PAWN_nameDef}의 죽음안식을 위해 지정된 {BED_labelShort}(이)가 햇빛에 노출되어있습니다. {PAWN_nameDef}(은)는 여기서 죽음안식을 취할 수 없습니다.
LanguageData.MessageTooManyCustomXenotypes: 이미 최대 숫자의 인종형을 생성했습니다. 더 생성하려면 이미 존재하는 인종형을 삭제해야 합니다.
LanguageData.MessageConflictingGenesPresent: Cannot save xenotype with multiple conflicting genes.
LanguageData.MessageDeathrestBuildingBound: {BUILDING_labelShort} has been bound to {PAWN_nameDef} ({CUR}/{MAX} deathrest capacity).
LanguageData.MessageDevelopmentalStageSelectionDisabl: Developmental stage selection disabled by scenario.
LanguageData.MessagePawnHadNotEnoughBloodToProduceHem: {PAWN_nameDef} did not have enough blood to produce a hemogen pack.
LanguageData.MessageCannotStartHemogenExtraction: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't have enough blood to produce a hemogen pack.
LanguageData.MessageCannotPostponeGrowthMoment: You must choose how {PAWN_nameDef} will grow now.
LanguageData.MessageDraftedPawnCarryingBaby: Warning: {0_labelShort} is carrying a baby while drafted.
